title: Can use characters i haven't  unlocked yet
body: I recently started playing LOL, and have found i can play with multiple characters i haven't unlocked yet. How? am i renting them? There is a blue lock sign on the top right, and i can take this character into all battles. Some of these include Caitlin and Morgana. Please help!

replies.body: While you're below level 10 you have access to a specific list of some sort of 'beginner friendly' champions. After that, you'll have access to the free weekly rotation of champions to choose from.
